markdownRemark.html:
Use simplify

g Follow the install instructions from the link:

  1. git clone --recursive https://github.com/CalebFenton/simplify.git
  2. ./gradlew fatjar
  3. run simplify.jar from simplify/build/libs/simplify.jar.

Checkpoint
